person.persName: James Pigg (Pendleton County, KY, laborer and farmer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Harrison County, Kentucky, native. Son of Spencer F. Pigg and Mary Pigg. Married to Rachel King Pigg in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on September 27, 1859. Father of Nancy E. Pigg. Laborer in Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1863.
